Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillcrest Drive, south of the Circle-Bar Ranch.
Room.LongDescription: The Circle-Bar Ranch is a large cattle ranch where cows are raised and then slaughtered for their meat. Being a very precious commodity, the cows are guarded very carefully by the cattle ranchers and dangerous ranch dogs. The intersection with Overland Drive lies to the east.
